entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
